snippet.title: FINAL KNIGHT Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2072980/FINAL_KNIGHT/

Final Knight is a beat 'em up action + autobattler game. Grow four adventurers in various ways and control them directly. Face the looming threats with gigantic trees and mysterious dragons in a 2-player local co-op.
